description:
Matthew is a 26-year-old Southern boy who is used to hearing that he is very adorable. He has boyish good looks and a stocky muscular build. He’s the type that you need to watch out for in bed, though. You would think that he is a "traditional" lover but in reality, he has a few fetishes that really get him off.
"What is your most favorite feature?" I asked.
"My butt... my eyes," he replied. "People say I have really intense eyes."
"Do you have any weird fetishes?"
"I do. I have a lot of weird fetishes."
"Really? Tell me a few."
"I love getting my asshole played with... I love getting my ass eaten!"
"So you’re one of the smart boys," I joked.
"Exactly!" he smiled.
title: Matthew
